TopicTitle: Expansions for the Stock Lander Cans

Articles.Content:
well since the success of SDHI by Sumghai, i have always wondered if anyone was willing to do anything for the lander cans as they seem to be largely neglected...

i am not saying make them into something similar to the Russian LK and the LEM but to build them parts that would make use of what makes them good pods which is visibility and just general shape.

They would be used for quickly and efficiently dropping cargo and equipment to a site without much fuss and do crew rotations if necessary

just a suggestion

That would be cool!

It should also be relatively easy to do as it would probably consist of at max 10 new parts and at least 4 because it could have just radial thrusters and fuel tanks as the lander legs, docking ports, and rcs can just stay stock
